mapper.select: SELECT id, description, created_time as createdTime, created_by as createdBy, last_modified_by as lastModifiedBy, last_modified_time as lastModifiedTime FROM tbl_unreached_reason ORDER BY id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_unreached_reason ( id, description, created_time, created_by, last_modified_by, last_modified_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{description}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{createdBy}, #{lastModifiedBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_unreached_reason SET description = #{description}, last_modified_by = #{lastModifiedBy}, last_modified_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
